Class Inode

  • java.lang.Object
    • Inode

  • public class Inode
extends java.lang.Object
    An inode in the filesystem.

        public Inode(Volume vol,
             int id,
             int offset)
        Sets up the inode object.
        Parameters:
        vol - The volume the inode is in
        id - ID of this inode
        offset - Start position of inode in whole filesystem
